com.samsung.android.sdk.health.sensor

Class ShealthDeviceFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.health.sensor.ShealthDeviceFinder

  • public class ShealthDeviceFinder
extends Object
    This class provides an easy to use interface to the Health Sensor Service.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ShealthDeviceFinder.ScanListener
      This listener interface receives scan status events.
      static interface  ShealthDeviceFinder.ServiceConnectionListener
      This listener interface receives service connection and disconnection events.

                   ShealthDeviceFinder.ServiceConnectionListener listener)

        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        listener - The ShealthDeviceFinder.ServiceConnectionListener ServiceConnectionListener instance.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the ShealthDeviceFinder instance after use. The closing unbinds the application from the Health Sensor Service that can be terminated by the Android framework.

      • startScan

        public void startScan(int connectivityType,
             int deviceType,
             int dataType,
             int durationSeconds,
             ShealthDeviceFinder.ScanListener listener)
               throws RemoteException,
                      IllegalArgumentException,
                      ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException,
                      ShealthSensorNotSupportedException
        This method is called to do Scan of devices which are in the vicinity.
        Parameters:
        connectivityType - The sensor connectivity type, such as Bluetooth or ANT+.
        deviceType - The sensor device type, such as a blood pressure monitor or blood glucose meter.
        dataType - The sensor data type, such as blood pressure, blood glucose, or weight.
        durationSeconds - The duration of the scan in seconds.
        listener - The ScanListener instance to receive the scan response.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Thrown if the scanning fails.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an argument passed is not valid.
        ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException - Thrown if the application is not connected to the Health Sensor Service.
        ShealthSensorNotSupportedException - Thrown if the device does not support the sensor operation.

      • startScan

        public void startScan(int connectivityType,
             String deviceId,
             int durationSeconds,
             ShealthDeviceFinder.ScanListener listener)
               throws RemoteException,
                      IllegalArgumentException,
                      ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException,
                      ShealthSensorNotSupportedException
        This method is called to find a specific device with a unique sensor device ID
        Parameters:
        connectivityType - Sensor type like BT, ANT+, etc
        deviceId - Unique Device ID
        durationSeconds - Duration in seconds the Scan to last
        listener - Listener callback to send scan response
        Throws:
        RemoteException, - IllegalArgumentException, ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException, ShealthSensorNotSupportedException
        RemoteException
        IllegalArgumentException
        ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException
        ShealthSensorNotSupportedException

      • stopScan

        public void stopScan()
              throws RemoteException,
                     ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException
        This method is called to stop the scan which was started earlier
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Thrown if the scanning fails.
        ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException - Thrown if the application is not connected to the Health Sensor Service.

      • getConnectedDeviceList

        public List<ShealthSensorDevice> getConnectedDeviceList(int connectivityType,
                                               int deviceType,
                                               int dataType)
                                                 throws RemoteException,
                                                        IllegalArgumentException,
                                                        ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException,
                                                        ShealthSensorNotSupportedException
        Get the list of all currently connected devices.
        Parameters:
        connectivityType - The sensor connectivity type, such as Bluetooth or ANT+.
        deviceType - The sensor device type, such as blood pressure monitor or blood glucose meter.
        dataType - The sensor data type, such as blood pressure, blood glucose, or weight.
        Returns:
        The list of connected sensor devices.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Thrown if the scanning fails.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an argument passed is not valid.
        ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException - Thrown if the application is not connected to the Health Sensor Service.
        ShealthSensorNotSupportedException - Thrown if the device does not support the sensor operation.

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable(int connectivityType,
                  int deviceType,
                  int dataType,
                  String protocol)
                    throws RemoteException,
                           IllegalArgumentException,
                           ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException
        Checks whether the sensor with the specified connectivity type, device type, and data type is available.
        Parameters:
        connectivityType - The sensor connectivity type, such as Bluetooth or ANT+.
        deviceType - The sensor device type, such as blood pressure monitor or blood glucose meter.
        dataType - The sensor data type, such as blood pressure, blood glucose, or weight.
        protocol - The protocol name, such as Continua and SHAP.
        Returns:
        Returns true if available
        Throws:
        RemoteException, - IllegalArgumentException, ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException
        RemoteException
        IllegalArgumentException
        ShealthSensorServiceNotBoundException
